author: @harshtripathi_05

text:
Revolt ne selling point ke chakkar me isko sporty look bna diya, apache rtr ke look me bhi bnaya ja skta tha, low seat height both, ye isme pahad pr kon chadega battery bike to isko log range ke liye slow chalayenge, faltu design
Bike ko bhagane wale log isko bilkul bhi ni lenge kyuki phir range kam hojayegi.
City mode pr comfortable bike chahye to mujhe design badhiya ni lagi, 
Mere papa ke pass h ye not practical for pillion usability, r15 jaise h, aasman me baitha h pillion
author: @Hi_et_ler

text:
R15 ke look me bnaya h , bina mtlb ke pillion seat ko itna high kra h, ye electric bike apne papa log he lenge milege low krne ke liye bhai, not practical for them, isse achaa to papa log ko r15 le do

Service to inki pucho he mt, kya bekar service h, 150 ki range claim krte h, eco mode me ye 125 jayegi and 2 saal baad 70km uper se inke parts replacement ke nakhre, 

Bhai electric scooty khrid lo isse acha
author: @Hi_et_ler
